attributes.action: Abolish the monthly £400 food allowance given to MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When many constituents can't even afford £400 to shop for food each month, I think everybody will agree that this is a unnecessary benefit, bearing in mind the annual salary and other benefits MP's receive. I therefore urge everybody to sign this so that the money can be put to a better use for us all-not just those who are supposed to serve us.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
